name: JoinedBots
description:
The scientists are testing a new kind of intelligent weapon to destroy the world! Right now they are testing its ability to process information and pass trought diferent kinds of environment!

Join the robots together to make a unique form in order to pass to the next level!

Try to find new ways to clear the game!

The controls are: Arrows to move around, UP arrow to jump, escape to pause game and R to restart the level.

If the game isn't loading refresh the page.
